task: Find the NASA award number under which the work performed by R. G. Arendt in the paper linked at the bottom of the Universe Today article published by Carolyn Collins Petersen on June 6, 2023, was supported.
plan_summary: Locate the article by Carolyn Collins Petersen on Universe Today, find the linked paper, and determine the NASA award number for R. G. Arendt's support.

steps.title: Find the Universe Today article by Carolyn Collins Petersen published on June 6, 2023
steps.details: Search Universe Today for articles by Carolyn Collins Petersen, focusing on those published on June 6, 2023, to locate the specific article.

steps.title: Locate and access the linked paper in the article
steps.details: At the bottom of the located article, find the link to the team-produced paper mentioned and access it.

steps.title: Identify the NASA award number supporting R. G. Arendt in the paper
steps.details: Within the accessed paper, search for any acknowledgments or funding information sections to identify the NASA award number for R. G. Arendt.
